text: Glitterbug may refer to: *Glitterbug (film), final film of Derek Jarman *Glitterbug (album), album by The Wombats, 2015 *Glitterbug Tour 2015, by The Wombats *Glitterbug B Sides EP by The Wombats exclusive to HMV 2015 *"Glitterbug", song by Page and Duffy from album The Vanity Project *"Glitterbug", song from Slinky Vagabond Keanan Duffty *Glitterbug (band) from Insomnia Festival and Nabovarsel
title: Glitterbug
